naslov: MODERNA KUĆA SA BAZENOM (na duže)– ŽRNOVNICA, SPLIT video / čitaj opis (iznajmljivanje)
opis: - ekskluzivan najam agencije #adriaINgroup (agencijska provizija visina mjesečnog najma) NAPOMENA: kuća se iznajmljuje od 01.10.2025.godine, te na duži period (1.godina + )  / PREGLED I REZERVACIJA MOGUĆI ODMAH - sklapanje ugovora datumom kapare Iznajmljuje se moderna kuća na osami, smještena u mirnom i slikovitom mjestu Žrnovnica, nadomak Splita i Podstrane. Ova jedinstvena nekretnina nalazi se u neposrednoj blizini rijeke Žrnovnice i predivne šetnice, idealne za opuštanje i uživanje u prirodi. Kuća se prostire na dvije etaže i nudi dvije zasebne stambene jedinice: - Prizemlje – jednosobni stan s vlastitom kupaonicom i kuhinjom te izlazom na prostranu terasu, savršen za goste ili kao zaseban prostor za članove obitelji. - Kat – prostrani, moderno uređen trosobni stan s balkonom i panoramskim pogledom na planine. Iz dnevnog boravka izlazi se na veliku terasu s privatnim bazenom, sunčalištem i vanjskim natkrivenim kaminom – idealno za uživanje tijekom cijele godine. + Potpuno namještena i opremljena kuća + Privatnost i mir, a opet blizina svih sadržaja + Dugoročni najam – idealno za obitelj ili parove koji traže dom izvan gradske vreve + Blizina Splita, mora i svih prometnih poveznica - stambeno cca 150m2 + okućnica sa terasama cca 200m2 - dvije prostrane garaže i sprema Lokacija: Žrnovnica, 10 minuta vožnje do mora i Splita VIDEO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t99FOYc63PY + vlasnik je zamolio potencijalne klijente da NE POKUŠAVAJU stupiti u kontakt s istim ENG ---------------------------------------------- - exclusive rental agency #adriaINgroup (agency commission amount of monthly rent) NOTE: the house is rented from 01.10.2025, and for a longer period (1.year + ) / VIEW AND RESERVATION POSSIBLE IMMEDIATELY - contract conclusion on the date of the down payment A modern house is for rent in a secluded location, located in a quiet and picturesque place Žrnovnica, near Split and Podstrana. This unique property is located in the immediate vicinity of the Žrnovnica River and a beautiful promenade, ideal for relaxing and enjoying nature. The house is spread over two floors and offers two separate residential units: - Ground floor - one-bedroom apartment with private bathroom and kitchen and access to a spacious terrace, perfect for guests or as a separate space for family members. - First floor - spacious, modernly decorated three-bedroom apartment with a balcony and panoramic mountain views. The living room opens onto a large terrace with a private pool, sundeck and outdoor covered fireplace - ideal for year-round enjoyment. + Fully furnished and equipped house + Privacy and peace, yet close to all amenities + Long-term rental - ideal for a family or couples looking for a home away from the hustle and bustle of the city + Close to Split, the sea and all transport links - living space approx. 150m2 + garden with terraces approx. 200m2 - two spacious garages and storage Location: Žrnovnica, 10 minutes drive to the sea and Split VIDEO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t99FOYc63PY + the owner has asked potential clients NOT TO TRY to contact him #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
